channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2023100902
item.description:
Report X-2023100902

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-06
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Improper handling caused liquid to leak through vent cap. DescribePack: Loose or leaking vent cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a hazmat tote and segregated from package handlers.

item.title: Report X-2023100883
item.description:
Report X-2023100883

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: NATICK
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was discovered on a vehicle when being unload the package handler, notice the bottom was wet. He notified a manager immediately. The hazmat was then placed in a red hazmat bin and taken to the hazmat cage, placed under the vent with the vent on. DescribePack: Upon inspection of the hazmat, two of the caps became loose during transpiration and the plastic bag tie fell off the bag. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was placed under the vent in the hazmat cage with the vent on.

item.title: Report X-2023100869
item.description:
Report X-2023100869

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-05
  • City: BOYLSTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: box was found on its side leaking. Box placed upright into the box and taken to Hazmat cage for inspection. DescribePack: Side and bottom of box wet. Upon inspection found 2 cans severely bent and leaking, and the other 4 with varying degrees of bent and dented. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Placed 1 of the cans laying down with damage up, and the rest of the box into the bucket and to the Hazmat cage for inspection

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

Opened to find 6 cans dented, 1 of which is the most damaged and seeping. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Box placed into hazmat bucket and taken to Hazmat cage for inspection

item.title: Report X-2023100481
item.description:
Report X-2023100481

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-03
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS DAMAGED IN THE UNLOAD BY ANOTHER LEAKING PACKAKE. IT WAS TRANSPORTED TO THE REWRAP TABLE ON THE SOUTH SORT BOTTOM SLIDE TO BE REWRAPPED. THERE, THE REWRAP PERSON NOTICED THERE WAS AN AEROSOL CAN IN THE PACKAGE WITHOUT ANY HAZMAT MARKINGS ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE BOX. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN BROUGHT TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER UNDECLARED PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023100480
item.description:
Report X-2023100480

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-03
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SORTER ON THE SOUTH SORT AISLE NOTICED PACKAGE WAS TORN OPEN AND THAT IT CONTAINED 3 AEROSOL CANS IN THE PACKAGE. SORTER NOTIFIED A SUPERVISOR WHO THEN CHECKED OUT THE PACKAGE AND CALLED FOR A DESIGNATED RESPONDER. THE RESPONDER SAW THE THREE AEROSOL CANS IN THE PACKGE WITH NO OUTER HAZMAT MARKINGS. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER UNDECLARED PROCESSING.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box was found with spots of wetness. placed in bucket and taken to Hazmat cage for inspection. DescribePack: Top and side of box had spotting of wetness. Opened box to reveal 2 jugs with caps cracked and seals broken. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in bucket and taken to Hazmat cage for inspection.

item.description:
Report X-2023100586

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-29
  • City: BOYLSTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: box found leaking. Box placed into bucket and taken down to QA cage for inspection. DescribePack: Bottom of box wet. 1 bottle broken into several pieces. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed box into bucket and taken to QA cage for inspection, and placed rags under box to absorb liquid.

item.title: Report X-2023100435
item.description:
Report X-2023100435

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERD IN A TRAILER BY THE UNLOADER. HE STOPPED UNLOADING, HE LEFT THE AREA AND NOTIFIED HIS SUPERVISOR. THE SUPERVISOR THEN CALLED FOR A DESIGNATED RESPONDER. RESPONDER, FOLLOWING THE DECISION TREE AND APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET, PLACED THE PACKAGE INTO A LINED DMP SPILL TUB. THE AREA AND EQUIPMENT WAS DECONTAMINATED FOLLOWING THE EQUIPMENT DECONTAMINATION CHECKLIST. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN BROUGHT TO THE DMP WORKSTATION. IT WAS THEN DETERMANED TO BE AN UNDECLARED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL. THE PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED THROUGH THE UPS HAZRDOUS MATERIAL HELP DESK.

item.title: Report X-2023091111
item.description:
Report X-2023091111

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: EMPLOYEE NOTICED PACKAGE HAD A TEAR WHICH EXPOSED A LITHIUM ION BATTERY WITH NO UN LITHIUM BATTERY LABEL. RESPONDER CALLED HAZMAT HELP DESK FOR UNDECLARED.
